Player History
Earned first career win on 4/18/1985...
2/2/1987: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,131,429 through salary arbitration...
5/10/1987: Signed a contract extension with Los Angeles, $800,000 per year, for 3 years.
Had first career hit (double) on 6/26/1987, off Jeff Montgomery (CIN)...
Won World Series with Los Angeles in 1988...
7/27/1990: Signed a contract extension with Los Angeles, $430,000 per year, for 3 years.
